biotools.summary: A webserver for carrying out sequence and structure based analysis of Polyketide Synthases, an important family of multifunctional megasynthases involved in the biosynthesis of a variety of pharmaceutically important secondary metabolites.

bioschemas.name: SBSPKS
bioschemas.summary: A webserver for carrying out sequence and structure based analysis of Polyketide Synthases, an important family of multifunctional megasynthases involved in the biosynthesis of a variety of pharmaceutically important secondary metabolites.
